title: Teen Fatally Shot In Head, Juvenile Charged With Murder
content:
LEXINGTON, Ky. (LEX 18) - The Lexington teen killed after being shot in the head Friday evening has been identified, and a person has been charged with murder in the case.
The Fayette County Coroner has identified the victim as 17-year-old David Fletcher Jones.
The shooting happened around 5:30 p.m. at a home on Honey Jay Court near Center Parkway.
When responders arrived to the scene, they discovered the teen suffering from a gunshot wound to the head. According to authorities, the victim was taken to the hospital where he was pronounced dead.
Officials say three or four teenagers and one adult were in the basement of the home when the teen was shot.
Lexington police say they have charged a juvenile with murder in the shooting. The juvenile's name hasn't been released.
The investigation is ongoing.
